feed.title: NewsTracker: tamir rice
feed.subtitle: This is a news tracking demo

entry.title: Tamir Rice's Mom Says City's Response Is 'Disrespectful'
Mom responds after Cleveland officials blame boy for his death
entry.summary: Tamir Rice's mother and her attorneys planned a news conference Tuesday.

entry.title: Cleveland mayor apologizes for suggestion that Tamir Rice to blame for own death
entry.summary: Mayor Frank Jackson said the city's response to a federal lawsuit filed on behalf of Tamir Rice's family was poorly worded and offensive.

entry.title: Tamir Rice case: Cleveland mayor apologises after city claims 12-year-old to blame for his own police shooting death
entry.summary: Suddenly a police car appears, and without even leaving the driver's seat an officer shoots the boy, 12-year-old Tamir Rice in the stomach and torso.

entry.title: Tamir Rice case: Cleveland mayor apologises after city claims 12-year-old to blame for his own police shooting death
entry.summary:
Killed: 12-year-old Tamir Rice.

Now the city of Cleveland's response to a federal lawsuit bought against it by the Rice family has reopened the unhealed wounds.

entry.title: Cleveland mayor apologizes for city response to Tamir Rice lawsuit
entry.summary: Jackson said he was apologizing to Rice's family and to the city's residents for what he said was a poor choice of words in the city's response filed on Friday to the family's lawsuit.

entry.title: Cleveland: Boy shot by cop died because of his own actions
entry.summary: In court documents, the city says Tamir Rice's injuries and the subsequent complaints for damages were the result of his own actions and a failure "to exercise due care to avoid injury."
